$:/plugins/tg/leftmenu/leftmenu-entries.title: $:/plugins/tg/leftmenu/leftmenu-entries
$:/plugins/tg/leftmenu/leftmenu-entries.creator: TonGerner

$:/plugins/tg/leftmenu/readme.creator: TonGerner
$:/plugins/tg/leftmenu/readme.text:
This plugin creates a fixed left menu with a shifted story-river (which assumes a widescreen monitor - otherwise is is not possible to display the left menu, the story river, and the sidebar together).
The tiddler $:/plugins/tg/leftmenu/leftmenu-entries contains the left menu entries (transcluded in $:/plugins/tg/leftmenu/leftmenu).
For an alternative left menu (no widescreen needed) see http://tw5topleft.tiddlyspot.com/ <<< ''Note:'' * This plugin needs my $:/plugins/tg/layout plugin for general layout settings (available at http://tongerner.tiddlyspot.com/) * For more information about possible left menu entries see http://tw5topleft.tiddlyspot.com/ * To create more 'room' you can consider the 'Tight' theme <<< Settings for the layout can be found in ''~ControlPanel > Appearance > [[Plugin tweaks|$:/plugins/tg/layout/tweaks]]''.
$:/plugins/tg/leftmenu/readme.title: $:/plugins/tg/leftmenu/readme

$:/plugins/tg/leftmenu/settings.creator: TonGerner
$:/plugins/tg/leftmenu/settings.text:
!!Left menu <$button> <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler="$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/storyleft"/> <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler="$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/storyright"/> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/plugins/tg/leftmenu/styles" $field="leftmenu-width" $value="0px"/> Reset <$button> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/plugins/tg/leftmenu/storyleft" title="$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/storyleft"/> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/plugins/tg/leftmenu/storyright" title="$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/storyright"/> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/plugins/tg/leftmenu/styles" $field="leftmenu-width" $value="200px"/> Default @@.brown ''Left menu settings''@@ <> <> <>
<$button message="tm-open-window" param="$:/plugins/tg/leftmenu/settings-help" tooltip="Help" aria-label="Help">Help > ''Note:'' For ease of adjusting the 'Theme tweaks' tab has been transcluded below: {{$:/plugins/tg/layout/themetweaks}}
$:/plugins/tg/leftmenu/settings.title: $:/plugins/tg/leftmenu/settings
$:/plugins/tg/leftmenu/settings.caption: Left menu

$:/plugins/tg/leftmenu/settings-help.text:
|Entry |Description |Default|h
|Width 'Left menu'|Width of the left menu| 200px|
|Top 'Left menu'|Start (from the top) of the left menu| 75px|
|Scrolling height 'Left menu'|Height of scrolling area of the left menu| 600px|
$:/plugins/tg/leftmenu/settings-help.title: $:/plugins/tg/leftmenu/settings-help
$:/plugins/tg/leftmenu/settings-help.creator: TonGerner

$:/plugins/tg/leftmenu/slider-macro.text:
\define slider(label,text)
<$button popup="$:/state/$label$" class="tc-btn-invisible tgc-slider"><$text text="$label$ Â»"/></$button>
<$reveal type="nomatch" text="" default="" state="$:/state/$label$" animate="yes">

{{$text$}}

</$reveal>
\end
$:/plugins/tg/leftmenu/slider-macro.title: $:/plugins/tg/leftmenu/slider-macro
$:/plugins/tg/leftmenu/slider-macro.creator: TonGerner

$:/plugins/tg/leftmenu/styles.text:
/* LEFT MENU */

/* LEFT MENU, FIXED IN POSITION */
html .tgc-leftmenu {
     display: block;
     padding: 0px 0px 0px 20px;
     position: fixed;
     left: 0px;
     top: {{!!top-leftmenu}};
     width: {{!!leftmenu-width}};
     z-index: 99;
}
.tgc-scrollable-menu {
     padding: 1em;
     height: {{!!scroll-height}};
     position: relative;
}

/* SLIDER STYLING */
html .tgc-slider {
     color: #006DEC;
     font-weight: bold;
}

.tgc-slider:hover {
     color: #006DEC;
     text-decoration: underline;
}

/* STYLING FOR DIRTREE MENU */

.dirtree, .dirtree ul {
     list-style-type: none;
     background-image: url(data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhEAAQAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAAQABAAAAIbRI6ppo3sGoxp0mNvpjt290nXMlblc2JpECoFADs=);
     background-repeat: repeat-y;
     margin: 0;
     padding: 0;
}
.dirtree ul {
     margin-left: 16px;
}
.dirtree li {
     margin: 0;
     padding: 0 16px 0 18px;
     background-image: url(data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhEAAQAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAAQABAAAAISjI+py+0Po5wM2IszoLz7DwYFADs=);
     background-repeat: no-repeat;
     line-height: 1.5;
}
.dirtree li:last-child {
     background-image: url(data:image/gif;base64,R0lGODlhEAAQAIABAAAAAP///yH5BAEKAAEALAAAAAAQABAAAAIaRI6ppo3sGoxp0mNvpjuCD4Zid5XmiabqWQAAOw==);
     background-color: #fff;
}
$:/plugins/tg/leftmenu/styles.title: $:/plugins/tg/leftmenu/styles
$:/plugins/tg/leftmenu/styles.creator: TonGerner

$:/plugins/tg/leftmenu/help.text:
| Default values (px) |<|<||h || standard TW
Vanilla theme | with
left menu | Tight
theme|h |Width left menu | -| 200| 200| |Story left position | 0| 200| 160| |Story right | 770| 970| 920| If you want to change the width of the left menu, you have to change 'Story left position' and 'Story right' accordingly
$:/plugins/tg/leftmenu/help.title: $:/plugins/tg/leftmenu/help
$:/plugins/tg/leftmenu/help.creator: TonGerner
